mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photo (ptitle, pcontent, pimage, pwriter,preply) VALUES (#{ptitle}, #{pcontent}, #{pimage}, #{pwriter},#{preply})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM photo WHERE preply IS NULL ORDER BY pno DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE photo SET ptitle = #{ptitle}, pcontent = #{pcontent}, pimage = #{pimage}, pwriter = #{pwriter} WHERE pno = #{pno}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM photo WHERE preply = #{preply} ORDER BY pno DESC
